Entries.DialogueText: 你好，孩子。我叫潘姆。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好,孩子。我叫潘姆。

Entries.DialogueText: 只要你态度不恶劣，我们一定会成为朋友的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 只要你态度不恶劣,我们一定会成为朋友的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我滴个乖乖……我没想到会收到这样的礼物。孩子，我很高兴！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我滴个乖乖......我没想到会收到这样的礼物。孩子,我很高兴!

Entries.DialogueText: 看来周围有不少罕见的鱼，下次我必须得把鱼竿带上！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 看来周围有不少罕见的鱼,下次我必须得把鱼竿带上!

Entries.DialogueText: 啊……在路上，威利给每个人分了一块鱼干，非常美味！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊......在路上,威利给每个人分了一块鱼干,非常美味!

Entries.DialogueText: 我很想念我的女儿…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我很想念我的女儿......

Entries.DialogueText: 你对我家潘妮要好好的，听到没有？ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你对我家潘妮要好好的,听到没有?

Entries.DialogueText: 所以你真的跟莫尔纳家的小伙子结婚了？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 所以你真的跟莫尔纳家的小伙子结婚了?

Entries.DialogueText: 那条臭烘烘的老狗你也带过去吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 那条臭烘烘的老狗你也带过去吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 这是上帝的信号……我们要完蛋了……%noturn {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这是上帝的信号......我们要完蛋了......

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，大概末日还没到吧，孩子……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎,大概末日还没到吧,孩子......

Entries.DialogueText: 唉，继续朝九晚五吧……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唉,继续朝九晚五吧......

Entries.DialogueText: 我觉得这场雨是在宣示力量……是一种告诫。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我觉得这场雨是在宣示力量......是一种告诫。

Entries.DialogueText: 至于是来自大自然还是来自由巴，这就随便你怎么想了……反正我觉得是这样。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 至于是来自大自然还是来自由巴,这就随便你怎么想了......反正我觉得是这样。

Entries.DialogueText: 说白了就是咱们不能太狂妄，不然下的可能不是绿雨而是血雨了……懂我意思不？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 说白了就是咱们不能太狂妄,不然下的可能不是绿雨而是血雨了......懂我意思不?

Entries.DialogueText: 潘妮哭着回家了……你对她做了什么？ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘妮哭着回家了......你对她做了什么?

Entries.DialogueText: 听说你建了一个鱼塘……嚯，我可是在鱼塘旁边长大的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 听说你建了一个鱼塘......嚯,我可是在鱼塘旁边长大的。

Entries.DialogueText: 几乎什么鱼都可以养在里面……但是有些稀有的鱼挑剔得很！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 几乎什么鱼都可以养在里面......但是有些稀有的鱼挑剔得很!

Entries.DialogueText: 好吧……孩子，钓鱼比赛你确实堂堂正正赢了我。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 好吧......孩子,钓鱼比赛你确实堂堂正正赢了我。

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……我可能不应该用啤酒面糊炸蘑菇当鱼饵…… {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔......我可能不应该用啤酒面糊炸蘑菇当鱼饵......

Entries.DialogueText: 真是舒服啊！我想把鞋子也脱掉！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真是舒服啊!我想把鞋子也脱掉!

Entries.DialogueText: 孩子，最好别凑近了看我的脚。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 孩子,最好别凑近了看我的脚。

Entries.DialogueText: 孩子，情况特殊……我要点一杯特别的。要烈一点的！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 孩子,情况特殊......我要点一杯特别的。要烈一点的!

Entries.DialogueText: 哇哦，看看这个……像是来自未来的东西。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哇哦,看看这个......像是来自未来的东西。

Entries.DialogueText: 哈哈，抱歉了孩子……我用不来这个。这上面的按钮甚至比我的脑细胞还多！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哈哈,抱歉了孩子......我用不来这个。这上面的按钮甚至比我的脑细胞还多!

Entries.DialogueText: 不敢相信，你给我买了房子！有什么陷井吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不敢相信,你给我买了房子!有什么陷井吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 对不起，我还不习惯人们对我这么好…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 对不起,我还不习惯人们对我这么好......

Entries.DialogueText: 我很喜欢新房子，孩子，真心谢谢你啊！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我很喜欢新房子,孩子,真心谢谢你啊!

Entries.DialogueText: 我不敢相信有人给我买了房子！我想知道这是不是某种骗局？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我不敢相信有人给我买了房子!我想知道这是不是某种骗局?

Entries.DialogueText: 对不起，我还不习惯人们对我这么好…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 对不起,我还不习惯人们对我这么好......

Entries.DialogueText: 跟老潘姆的约会之夜吗？哈！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 跟老潘姆的约会之夜吗?哈!

Entries.DialogueText: 跟老潘姆的闺蜜之夜吗？哈！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 跟老潘姆的闺蜜之夜吗?哈!

Entries.DialogueText: 当然好啊，孩子……我们到时候见。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 当然好啊,孩子......我们到时候见。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，你听说过那辆老巴士吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿,你听说过那辆老巴士吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 听说过……我又坐上驾驶座了，孩子……嘿嘿。感觉不错。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 听说过......我又坐上驾驶座了,孩子......嘿嘿。感觉不错。

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} PamDrank
Entries.DisplayPattern: # PamDrank

Entries.DialogueText: 噢……我的头……$k
如果有钱的话，谁不想吃得健康点啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果有钱的话,谁不想吃得健康点啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 喂，你那农场上一定种了不少好吃的，对吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂,你那农场上一定种了不少好吃的,对吧?

Entries.DialogueText: 我这把老骨头，就靠喝点小酒才能暖和过来…… {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我这把老骨头,就靠喝点小酒才能暖和过来......

Entries.DialogueText: 啊……终于能歇会了。/得赶紧喝一杯。/格斯！就来我平常那杯。/喂！我回来了！/啊啊，还真是喉咙冒烟了！/简直要渴死了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊......终于能歇会了。/得赶紧喝一杯。/格斯!就来我平常那杯。/喂!我回来了!/啊啊,还真是喉咙冒烟了!/简直要渴死了!

Entries.DialogueText: 潘妮！做完饭了吗？/潘妮！家务干了吗？/潘妮！你在家吗？/喂！我回来了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘妮!做完饭了吗?/潘妮!家务干了吗?/潘妮!你在家吗?/喂!我回来了!

Entries.DialogueText: 你好，孩子。如果我有钱的话，一定请你喝一杯！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好,孩子。如果我有钱的话,一定请你喝一杯!

Entries.DialogueText: 喂，格斯！再来一杯！*打嗝* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂,格斯!再来一杯!*打嗝*

Entries.DialogueText: *唉* ……喂，小子，你这样的年轻人不该在这里逛游。
Entries.DisplayPattern: *唉* ......喂,小子,你这样的年轻人不该在这里逛游。

Entries.DialogueText: *大口喝酒*……一下午就盼着能来这里喝一口了。呵呵。
Entries.DisplayPattern: *大口喝酒*......一下午就盼着能来这里喝一口了。呵呵。

Entries.DialogueText: 格斯！最烈的酒再给我来一杯！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 格斯!最烈的酒再给我来一杯!

Entries.DialogueText: 潘姆没有任何反应。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘姆没有任何反应。

Entries.DialogueText: 潘姆似乎睡过去了。还是不要打扰她吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘姆似乎睡过去了。还是不要打扰她吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 喂！你可不要趁我不在偷偷溜进我的房车！懂了吗？ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂!你可不要趁我不在偷偷溜进我的房车!懂了吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 不好意思，只是不太信得过陌生人而已。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不好意思,只是不太信得过陌生人而已。

Entries.DialogueText: 我今天早上本来是在读报纸的，结果搞得很郁闷。这世界简直是烂透了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我今天早上本来是在读报纸的,结果搞得很郁闷。这世界简直是烂透了。

Entries.DialogueText: 你也得当心啊，不然早晚会搞得头破血流……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你也得当心啊,不然早晚会搞得头破血流......

Entries.DialogueText: 我老爸以前一直对我这么说。呵呵。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我老爸以前一直对我这么说。呵呵。

Entries.DialogueText: 这巴士重新开始运行，我真是再高兴不过了！感觉整个人又活了过来。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这巴士重新开始运行,我真是再高兴不过了!感觉整个人又活了过来。

Entries.DialogueText: 最近我过得不太好。前几天被公司给辞了，丢了巴士司机的工作。如果能重新当回巴士司机，就能载你去卡利科沙漠了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 最近我过得不太好。前几天被公司给辞了,丢了巴士司机的工作。如果能重新当回巴士司机,就能载你去卡利科沙漠了。

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} PamDrunk
Entries.DisplayPattern: # PamDrunk

Entries.DialogueText: 唉唉……昨晚稍微喝多了些，现在不舒服……快走开。$k
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唉唉......昨晚稍微喝多了些,现在不舒服......快走开。

Entries.DialogueText: 虽然我这房子不怎么样，但至少就在河边。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 虽然我这房子不怎么样,但至少就在河边。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿。潘妮可是我的宝贝女儿，你别欺负她，知道了吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿。潘妮可是我的宝贝女儿,你别欺负她,知道了吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 潘妮说我在酒吧待的时间太久了…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘妮说我在酒吧待的时间太久了......

Entries.DialogueText: 一个人在拖车里面简直孤独得可怕……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一个人在拖车里面简直孤独得可怕......

Entries.DialogueText: 其实，我一直在想……要是自己有个什么爱好就好了。这样也就不会每天晚上都去酒吧鬼混。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 其实,我一直在想......要是自己有个什么爱好就好了。这样也就不会每天晚上都去酒吧鬼混。

Entries.DialogueText: 你有没有什么好主意？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你有没有什么好主意?

Entries.DialogueText: ……唔，要么我自己和自己下五子棋怎么样？
Entries.DisplayPattern: ......唔,要么我自己和自己下五子棋怎么样?

Entries.DialogueText: 每天都是这么的单调，简直无聊透顶…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 每天都是这么的单调,简直无聊透顶......

Entries.DialogueText: 如果出生在有钱人家就好了…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果出生在有钱人家就好了......

Entries.DialogueText: 进来之前，你最好在门口把鞋上的泥都擦干净。 {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 进来之前,你最好在门口把鞋上的泥都擦干净。

Entries.DialogueText: 擦地板实在是太麻烦了。你也应该体谅一下。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 擦地板实在是太麻烦了。你也应该体谅一下。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果每天晚上有些小妖精出来替我打扫房间就好了。哈哈哈。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果每天晚上有些小妖精出来替我打扫房间就好了。哈哈哈。

Entries.DialogueText: 还真想吃些防风草呢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 还真想吃些防风草呢。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果我的腿没事的话，偶尔也想去山里看看呢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果我的腿没事的话,偶尔也想去山里看看呢。

Entries.DialogueText: 你和格斯是朋友吗？他这人挺不错的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你和格斯是朋友吗?他这人挺不错的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我生日的时候，他还给我免费啤酒来着。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我生日的时候,他还给我免费啤酒来着。

Entries.DialogueText: 喂，说话时注意点！不用你来告诉我该干什么不该干什么！ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂,说话时注意点!不用你来告诉我该干什么不该干什么!

Entries.DialogueText: ……不是吗？那太糟糕了！ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ......不是吗?那太糟糕了!

Entries.DialogueText: ……呃 {Portrait:Sad}
你好啊，陌生人。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊,陌生人。

Entries.DialogueText: 哦，这位是{Farmer_Name}先生。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦,这位是先生。

Entries.DialogueText: 哦，这位是{Farmer_Name}小姐。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦,这位是小姐。

Entries.DialogueText: 需要我帮你做些什么吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 需要我帮你做些什么吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 我以前也像你一样，有梦想也有希望……现在还不是落得这个下场。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我以前也像你一样,有梦想也有希望......现在还不是落得这个下场。

Entries.DialogueText: 生活总是不尽人意。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 生活总是不尽人意。

Entries.DialogueText: 不过话说回来，在这里自怨自艾也不是办法。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不过话说回来,在这里自怨自艾也不是办法。

Entries.DialogueText: 当地拥有一座农场对小镇来说可是件好事。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 当地拥有一座农场对小镇来说可是件好事。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果你的农场景气的话，或许当地的经济也会好转。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果你的农场景气的话,或许当地的经济也会好转。

Entries.DialogueText: 然后大家就都有工作了，然后就皆大欢喜了不是吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 然后大家就都有工作了,然后就皆大欢喜了不是吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊，农夫。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊,农夫。

Entries.DialogueText: 我不太习惯和陌生人讲话。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我不太习惯和陌生人讲话。

Entries.DialogueText: 我总是不知不觉得就跑到酒吧坐坐。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我总是不知不觉得就跑到酒吧坐坐。

Entries.DialogueText: 大概是离我家太近了吧。这生活方式太不健康。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 大概是离我家太近了吧。这生活方式太不健康。

Entries.DialogueText: ……是吗？
你这小伙子年轻英俊，干嘛要来和我这老女人搭讪？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你这小伙子年轻英俊,干嘛要来和我这老女人搭讪?

Entries.DialogueText: 你这么年轻貌美，为什么要来特意和我说话？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你这么年轻貌美,为什么要来特意和我说话?

Entries.DialogueText: 别怕附近那条狗。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 别怕附近那条狗。

Entries.DialogueText: 虽然看起来可能有点凶，不过那狗是不会冲过来咬你的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 虽然看起来可能有点凶,不过那狗是不会冲过来咬你的。

Entries.DialogueText: 你想知道那狗叫什么？就叫达斯迪啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你想知道那狗叫什么?就叫达斯迪啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 有人在到处抱怨我的院子太乱。是你吗？ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有人在到处抱怨我的院子太乱。是你吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 如果和你更熟的话，可能会更谈的开吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果和你更熟的话,可能会更谈的开吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 别看我现在这样，很久以前我也像你这么年轻呢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 别看我现在这样,很久以前我也像你这么年轻呢。

Entries.DialogueText: 人老了，感觉时间也过得飞快。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 人老了,感觉时间也过得飞快。

Entries.DialogueText: *唉*……看来今天的晚餐又要吃速冻食品了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *唉*......看来今天的晚餐又要吃速冻食品了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我除了潘妮一无所有。你可要好好待她。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我除了潘妮一无所有。你可要好好待她。

Entries.DialogueText: 每天都是一成不变…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 每天都是一成不变......

Entries.DialogueText: 你有没有这么觉得呢，农夫？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你有没有这么觉得呢,农夫?

Entries.DialogueText: 你能不能帮帮忙，打扫一下我家？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你能不能帮帮忙,打扫一下我家?

Entries.DialogueText: 说笑呢。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 说笑呢。

Entries.DialogueText: 你没活干吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你没活干吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 有工作就知足吧，至少不用每天在镇上游荡。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有工作就知足吧,至少不用每天在镇上游荡。

Entries.DialogueText: 真想念以前当卡车司机的时候。以前我开着大卡到处跑，能见到各种各样的人，还能天天听广播。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真想念以前当卡车司机的时候。以前我开着大卡到处跑,能见到各种各样的人,还能天天听广播。

Entries.DialogueText: 人生真是说变就变呢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 人生真是说变就变呢。

Entries.DialogueText: 你的农场有没有野猪？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你的农场有没有野猪?

Entries.DialogueText: 你找我是想要点什么吗？还是去别处吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你找我是想要点什么吗?还是去别处吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 我就是想让潘妮以后有好日子过。等你有了自己的孩子，就明白我的心情了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我就是想让潘妮以后有好日子过。等你有了自己的孩子,就明白我的心情了。

Entries.DialogueText: ……冬天还真是干燥。感觉皮肤都皱成了羊皮纸。
Entries.DisplayPattern: ......冬天还真是干燥。感觉皮肤都皱成了羊皮纸。

Entries.DialogueText: 喂。你在农场里一定要好好对待潘妮。我就只剩她一个人了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂。你在农场里一定要好好对待潘妮。我就只剩她一个人了!

Entries.DialogueText: 喂，孩子！你这是要去干什么？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂,孩子!你这是要去干什么?

Entries.DialogueText: 我只是和平常一样，消磨时间而已。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我只是和平常一样,消磨时间而已。

Entries.DialogueText: 今天还真是冷。或许去酒吧一趟，喝几杯就暖和了。呵呵。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今天还真是冷。或许去酒吧一趟,喝几杯就暖和了。呵呵。

Entries.DialogueText: 不如你晚上也来酒吧坐坐，和我一起喝两杯？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不如你晚上也来酒吧坐坐,和我一起喝两杯?

Entries.DialogueText: 潘妮还真是喜欢旧书。我小时候脑子可没她那么聪明。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘妮还真是喜欢旧书。我小时候脑子可没她那么聪明。

Entries.DialogueText: 我很欣慰。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我很欣慰。

Entries.DialogueText: 河就在眼前，我是不是该学学钓鱼……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 河就在眼前,我是不是该学学钓鱼......

Entries.DialogueText: 啊啊……我的前院还真乱。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊啊......我的前院还真乱。

Entries.DialogueText: 孩子，你好啊。没被淋湿吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 孩子,你好啊。没被淋湿吧?

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.

Entries.DialogueText: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel...

Entries.DialogueText: Penny, from now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny, from now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: This must have cost a fortune, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This must have cost a fortune, ...

Entries.DialogueText: ...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this?

Entries.DialogueText: It's a gift... no repayment needed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a gift... no repayment needed.

Entries.DialogueText: You can start by treating Penny better...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can start by treating Penny better...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'm sorry. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'm sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll do whatever you say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll do whatever you say...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, kid. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: Then... I'll just have to swallow my pride...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then... I'll just have to swallow my pride...

Entries.DialogueText: *ahem*... Thank you, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *ahem*... Thank you, .

Entries.DialogueText: ...We aren't 'poor' anymore, kid... put that thought out of your mind!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...We aren't 'poor' anymore, kid... put that thought out of your mind!

Entries.DialogueText: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...They probably stayed anonymous so we wouldn't have to feel obligated to them.

Entries.DialogueText: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoever you are... You are truly a pure angel...

Entries.DialogueText: Penny, I'm sorry you had to grow up in squalor... But I'm so happy you've found a good home. We both have, now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny, I'm sorry you had to grow up in squalor... But I'm so happy you've found a good home. We both have, now.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to try my best to live a good life, now... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to try my best to live a good life, now...

Entries.DialogueText: Robin... I... I dunno what to say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin... I... I dunno what to say...

Entries.DialogueText: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a dream come true... it's all I've ever wanted.

Entries.DialogueText: This must have cost a fortune, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This must have cost a fortune, ...

Entries.DialogueText: ...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...To be honest, this is kind of embarrassing. How can I ever repay you for this?

Entries.DialogueText: You're my 'Mom'!. No repayment needed!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're my 'Mom'!. No repayment needed!

Entries.DialogueText: You can start by treating Penny better...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can start by treating Penny better...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'm sorry. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'm sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll do whatever you say... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll do whatever you say...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, kid. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: Then... I'll just have to swallow my pride...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then... I'll just have to swallow my pride...

Entries.DialogueText: *ahem*... Thank you, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *ahem*... Thank you, .

Entries.DialogueText: ...I ain't 'poor' anymore, kid... put that thought out of your mind!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I ain't 'poor' anymore, kid... put that thought out of your mind!

Entries.DialogueText: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?
Entries.DisplayPattern: From now on we'll be like a real family... you hear?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't wanna be so bitter all the time anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't wanna be so bitter all the anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna try to turn my life around...

Entries.DialogueText: That's right
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's right

Entries.DialogueText: You're in for a treat, kid. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're in for a treat, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, kid
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, kid

Entries.DialogueText: Hiya! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hiya!

Entries.DialogueText: Gus... I'm awful thirsty, if you catch my drift.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gus... I'm awful thirsty, if you catch my drift.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, what's going on here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: , what's going on here?

Entries.DialogueText: You need to pay your tab right now!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You need to pay your tab right now!

Entries.DialogueText: The saloon isn't doing well, financially
Entries.DisplayPattern: The saloon isn't doing well, financially

Entries.DialogueText: .... {Portrait:Unique}
*sigh* ...Well, I guess I'd better pay off that tab, then. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh* ...Well, I guess I'd better pay off that tab, then.

Entries.DialogueText: It's great Gus. And it tastes even better because it's on the house! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's great Gus. And it tastes even better because it's on the house!

Entries.DialogueText: Whaddya think you're doing?! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whaddya think you're doing?!

Entries.DialogueText: Stop it! I had everything just the way I like it! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stop it! I had everything just the way I like it!

Entries.DialogueText: It's none of your damn business where I go! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's none of your damn business where I go!

Entries.DialogueText: Selfish? I put a roof over your head and clothes on your back and you call me selfish!? You ungrateful little... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Selfish? I put a roof over your head and clothes on your back and you call me selfish!? You ungrateful little...

Entries.DialogueText: You'd better go. I'm sorry you had to see this, kid. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'd better go. I'm sorry you had to see this, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: He's a nice young man...
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's a nice young man...

Entries.DialogueText: She's a nice young lady...
Entries.DisplayPattern: She's a nice young lady...

Entries.DialogueText: But I don't want you tellin' others to clean up my house! It's embarrassing! You understand? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I don't want you tellin' others to clean up my house! It's embarrassing! You understand?

Entries.DialogueText: Heheh... I see the delivery came in. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heheh... I see the delivery came in.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's have a little taste. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's have a little taste.

Entries.DialogueText: Ptooey!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ptooey!

Entries.DialogueText: I said potato, not fermented baboon kidney! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I said potato, not fermented baboon kidney!

Entries.DialogueText: The juice? Yeah, I tried it, kid. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The juice? Yeah, I tried it, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: How'd it taste? ...Some things are better left unsaid. Let's just leave it at that. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How'd it taste? ...Some things are better left unsaid. Let's just leave it at that.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, kid...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, kid...

Entries.DialogueText: You caught me prayin'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You caught me prayin'...

Entries.DialogueText: This here's my new 'Sign Of The Vessel' statue.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This here's my new 'Sign Of The Vessel' statue.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Ordered it from Joja.com with free 2-day shipping. Don't tell Pierre.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Ordered it from Joja.com with free 2-day shipping. Don't tell Pierre.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I've been settling in to the new house. It's really a great place. Feels like home already. I really do appreciate this new comfort. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I've been settling in to the new house. It's really a great . Feels like home already. I really do appreciate this new comfort.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, Sorry...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, Sorry...

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... It's just... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... It's just...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I should be so happy... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I should be so happy...

Entries.DialogueText: ...But I haven't been able to cut back on the beer... I haven't changed at all... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But I haven't been able to cut back on the beer... I haven't changed at all...

Entries.DialogueText: For a long time, now... I've felt like there's something missing from my life, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: For a long , now... I've felt like there's something missing from my life, ...

Entries.DialogueText: I always thought it was about money... Just bein' poor... ya know? So I figured gettin' this house would solve everything. But ...it didn't. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always thought it was about money... Just bein' poor... ya know? So I figured gettin' this house would solve everything. But ...it didn't.

Entries.DialogueText: So that's... That's why I ordered this statue.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So that's... That's why I ordered this statue.

Entries.DialogueText: Say something to Pam:
Entries.DisplayPattern: Say something to Pam:

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you're feeling hopeful
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you're feeling hopeful

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry Pam, but Yoba isn't real...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry Pam, but Yoba isn't real...

Entries.DialogueText: That ain't funny! ...I pour my heart out to you and that's how you respond? What in the void is wrong with you? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That ain't funny! ...I pour my heart out to you and that's how you respond? What in the void is wrong with you?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't care what you say... I have faith in Yoba! Plenty of us do! Now get out. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't care what you say... I have faith in Yoba! Plenty of us do! Now get out.

Entries.DialogueText: Hah! Well, look at me! I'm gettin' real sappy in my old age, aren't I? ...hehehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah! Well, look at me! I'm gettin' real sappy in my old age, aren't I? ...hehehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for lendin' an ear, kid
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for lendin' an ear, kid

Entries.DialogueText: 最好快点，孩子……在老潘姆来这儿之前把帐篷里所有大鱼都钓走！呵呵。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 最好快点,孩子......在老潘姆来这儿之前把帐篷里所有大鱼都钓走!呵呵。

Entries.DialogueText: 孩子，这生活真是太好了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 孩子,这生活真是太好了!

Entries.DialogueText: 凡是有免费食物可以吃吃吃的活动我都会去！不过闹鬼迷宫什么的就别算上我了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 凡是有免费食物可以吃吃吃的活动我都会去!不过闹鬼迷宫什么的就别算上我了。

Entries.DialogueText: 再来一瓶一瓶南瓜啤酒！……嗝…… {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 再来一瓶一瓶南瓜啤酒!......嗝......

Entries.DialogueText: 哈哈……我在潘趣酒里加了料。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哈哈......我在潘趣酒里加了料。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘘……别告诉其他人哦，小伙子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘘......别告诉其他人哦,小伙子。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿……孩子，如果你要让我吃鸡蛋的话，我还要配一点辣酱！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿......孩子,如果你要让我吃鸡蛋的话,我还要配一点辣酱!

Entries.DialogueText: 这才是生活嘛……对吧，小子？小桥美酒人家……咦，我说美酒来着吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这才是生活嘛......对吧,小子?小桥美酒人家......咦,我说美酒来着吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 风中飘散着红色果冻，就像在跳舞一样！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 风中飘散着红色果冻,就像在跳舞一样!

Entries.DialogueText: 呃……我大概是喝醉了吧。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呃......我大概是喝醉了吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿嘿……免费大餐。住在星露谷真是福利多多啊。好好享受吧，小子！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿嘿......免费大餐。住在星露谷真是福利多多啊。好好享受吧,小子!

Entries.DialogueText: （咕嘟咕嘟）太棒啦！这个我要多来一点！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: (咕嘟咕嘟)太棒啦!这个我要多来一点!

Entries.DialogueText: 今晚没有大餐我好失望啊，不过你别告诉格斯。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今晚没有大餐我好失望啊,不过你别告诉格斯。

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，孩子，你经营着农场吧，我问你……用这些玩意儿能做果酱吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎,孩子,你经营着农场吧,我问你......用这些玩意儿能做果酱吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 可以的话，我用来涂面包就能省不少钱！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 可以的话,我用来涂面包就能省不少钱!

Entries.DialogueText: 唉……没有赢得冰钓比赛，我好难过。 {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唉......没有赢得冰钓比赛,我好难过。

Entries.DialogueText: 大冷天只有喝一杯热酒才能让我暖和起来！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 大冷天只有喝一杯热酒才能让我暖和起来!

Entries.DialogueText: 我想赢得冰钓比赛！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我想赢得冰钓比赛!

Entries.DialogueText: 可是威利不是吃素的……钓鱼对他来说是家常便饭。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 可是威利不是吃素的......钓鱼对他来说是家常便饭。

Entries.DialogueText: 我去年输了是因为我选的地方不好，我感觉今年会很顺利。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我去年输了是因为我选的地方不好,我感觉今年会很顺利。

Entries.DialogueText: 呵，听你胡扯！我会证明你想错了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呵,听你胡扯!我会证明你想错了。

Entries.DialogueText: …… {Portrait:Love}
祝你也好运，孩子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 祝你也好运,孩子。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，嘿！真是太棒了！万分感谢，孩子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿,嘿!真是太棒了!万分感谢,孩子。

Entries.DialogueText: 这次你做的很好，孩子。谢谢！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这次你做的很好,孩子。谢谢!

Entries.DialogueText: 这不是我想要的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这不是我想要的。

Entries.DialogueText: 这样真的很恶劣。 {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这样真的很恶劣。

Entries.DialogueText: （这是什么恶作剧吗？）
Entries.DisplayPattern: (这是什么恶作剧吗?)

Entries.DialogueText: 谢谢，孩子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢谢,孩子。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，孩子。谢谢你邀请我。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿,孩子。谢谢你邀请我。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，那还不算太差！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿,那还不算太差!

Entries.DialogueText: 我没有钓鱿鱼的本事，不过没关系，我会在这里为你加油的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我没有钓鱿鱼的本事,不过没关系,我会在这里为你加油的。

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，孩子……你今天休息吗？偶尔放松一下也挺好的，是不是？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎,孩子......你今天休息吗?偶尔放松一下也挺好的,是不是?

Entries.DialogueText: 对啊……即使是我这把老骨头偶尔也要晒晒太阳！在我晒干之前叫醒我就行……呵呵……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 对啊......即使是我这把老骨头偶尔也要晒晒太阳!在我晒干之前叫醒我就行......呵呵......

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿嘿嘿……我在冰箱深处找到了一些放久了的喝的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿嘿嘿......我在冰箱深处找到了一些放久了的喝的。

Entries.DialogueText: 年轻人，我去参加节日了！你自己开车吧。——潘姆
Entries.DisplayPattern: 年轻人,我去参加节日了!你自己开车吧。——潘姆

Entries.DialogueText: 我今天去度假了！你自己开车吧。——潘姆
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我今天去度假了!你自己开车吧。——潘姆

Entries.DialogueText: 年轻人，我今天休息！你自己开车吧。——潘姆
Entries.DisplayPattern: 年轻人,我今天休息!你自己开车吧。——潘姆
